text: Hi all, has anyone built a module which pulls in the sitemap onto the page? Have managed to grab the sitemap.xml but cant get further than that :thinking_face:

Thanks <@U26BLKGE4> and <@U7SL518D6>! I wasnâ€™t seeing anything in the HTML, and this is just a simple text field, but completely clearing it & re-entering from scratch did do the trick. Seems like an invisible mystery character was definitely the case.
